Title: Cohort Tier Architecture
Description: $500, $1,500, $5,000/month tiers with differential entitlements. ACCEPTANCE: SLA table published; Entitlements enforced in gate; Audit of access controls passed; Upgrade/downgrade logic tested.
Parent: M16: Pricing Verification and Cohort Design

Title: Insight Packaging Design
Description: Weekly/biweekly drop templates with alert formats. ACCEPTANCE: Templates approved by stakeholders; Version stamps implemented; Delivery analytics > 70% open; Revision policy documented.

Title: Delivery Cadence Configuration
Description: Schedule setup for insight drops across tiers. ACCEPTANCE: Cron jobs configured; Tier-specific timing honored; Timezone handling correct; Manual override available.

Title: Renewal Reminder Sequence
Description: 30/7/1 day reminders with grace periods. ACCEPTANCE: Email templates approved; Timing accurate to SLA; Grace period logic working; Downgrade offers integrated.

Title: Churn Rescue Flows
Description: Downgrade offers and win-back campaigns. ACCEPTANCE: Downgrade path tested; Win-back sequence configured; Churn reason codes captured; Analytics dashboard live.

Title: Member Feedback System
Description: Structured surveys with NPS and anomaly detection. ACCEPTANCE: Survey templates deployed; NPS tracking live; Anomaly pipeline operational; Response SLA met.

Title: Claims Governance Framework
Description: Every claim linked to evidence artifact. ACCEPTANCE: Claims database created; Evidence links mandatory; Review workflow defined; Publish blocked without approval.

Title: Drop Scheduler Automation
Description: Content assembly, multi-channel delivery, logging. ACCEPTANCE: Scheduler runs on cadence; Multi-channel (email/Slack/app) working; Logs to Linear with coverage stats; Retry on delivery failures.

Title: Entitlement Gate System
Description: Tier-based access rules with audit reports. ACCEPTANCE: Access correctly gated per tier; Upgrades instant; Downgrades respect grace period; Monthly audit reports generated.
Parent: M16: Pricing Verification and Cohort Design

Title: Renewal/Dunning Workflow Automation
Description: Auto-reminders, payment retries, human escalation. ACCEPTANCE: Reminders sent per schedule; 3 payment retries with backoff; Human escalation on final fail; Success/fail logged.

Title: Feedback Ingestion Pipeline
Description: Survey parsing, topic clustering, auto-improvement tasks. ACCEPTANCE: Surveys parsed automatically; Topics clustered for analysis; Tasks created prioritized by ARR impact; Weekly summary to Linear.

Title: Claims Checker Automation
Description: Regex + rule engine for claim validation. ACCEPTANCE: All claims scanned before publish; Overreach flagged automatically; Evidence links required; Bypass requires approval + log.
